name: TrueorFalseTrivia
0:
”Alexa open True or False Trivia”
”Alexa, play True or False Trivia”
”Alexa, ask True or False Trivia to start new game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true or false trivia
des:
Play endless rounds of the best True/False Trivia game on the Alexa Store! Learn mind-blowing facts with new questions and premium categories added monthly!

How to Play: Answer each question with either True or False (Yes/No works too). Try to beat the other players in multiplayer or set a new high score in solo mode!

Whats Included:
---------------------
Solo Mode - a challenging single player game where you only get 3 lives. Each wrong answer will lose you a life. How far can you make it?

Multiplayer Mode - Great for friends, families and parties. Plays up to 4 players (If you want more let us know!)

Categories - The general knowledge category is our most popular, and features questions from all categories plus bonus categories that have yet to be released. Other free categories include Science, History and Geography questions. Dozens of new categories will be released over the course of the year! 

Cool features - The game contains sound effects, high scores, touchscreen compatibility, special messages for streaks and returning visits, hidden easter eggs, and more! Be sure to explore the game and keep an ear out for bonuses. New content added weekly!

What you can say: 
 - "Start a new game" (start new game at any time)
 - "Alexa, ask True or False Trivia for my high score" (Get information about your profile from outside the skill)
 - "What are the rules?" (Hear the ruleset at any time)
 - "How many lives do I have left?" (Use this command to find out how many lives you have left in solo mode)
 - "Repeat the question" (or simply say) "What?" 
 - "No Category" (Defaults to general questions. You can say this when asked to pick a category)
 - "List Categories" (Get a full detail of what categories are currently available)


CONTACT
------------
Want to Contribute? - email the lead developer @ Peter.Faucella@gmail.com. We are always looking for new questions and features to add! Feel free to reach out on Social media as well! @PeteyPlanets.

Feedback - We would be honored if you leave us an honest review in the skill store. Reviews go a long way for helping us reach more users and improve the quality of your experience. If you experience any issues at all please contact us at the email listed above or any of the social media channels provided. Thank you for your time and we hope you enjoy our game!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
